data.title: Bob Stephenson
data.meta_description: Bob Stephenson portrayed Silent Mike, an audio equipment technician, in the episode, "Other Voices, Other Rooms". Bob Stephenson is an American actor, writer and producer. In 2006 he was nominated for the Independent Spirit Award, Best First Feature, for "Thumbsucker" (2005).
data.text:
Bob Stephenson Role Portrayed Silent Mike Biographical Information Birth Name Bob Stephenson Birthdate May 18, 1967[1] Birthplace Camarillo, California, United States

Bob Stephenson portrayed Silent Mike, an audio equipment technician, in the episode, "Other Voices, Other Rooms".

Biography[]

Bob Stephenson is an American actor, writer and producer. In 2006 he was nominated for the Independent Spirit Award, Best First Feature, for "Thumbsucker" (2005).
